spells.name: Bowstaff
spells.description: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.

spells.name: Compel Hostility
spells.description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

spells.name: Liberating Command
spells.description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

spells.name: Litany of Sloth
spells.description: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

spells.name: Longshot
spells.description: Grants a +10-foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

spells.name: Tactical Acumen
spells.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.
